thread.title: This search engine could help unlock autism’s secrets PBS NewsHour
thread.title_full: Video: This search engine could help unlock autism’s secrets | Watch PBS NewsHour Online | PBS Video

author: pbs.org
title: This search engine could help unlock autism’s secrets PBS NewsHour
text: Scientists have long known that genetics play a role in autism, but now they may be able to actually pinpoint the specific gene variants, which could help doctors diagnose and treat the neurodevelopmental disorder from birth. Special correspondent Jackie Judd explores a project from Autism Speaks and Google that harnesses a powerful search engine to find new answers.
